ayas.translation: When the earth is shaken with her (violent) shaking,

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.

ayas.translation: And the earth brings forth her burdens,
And man says: What has befallen her?
On that day she shall tell her news,
Because your Lord had inspired her.

ayas.arabic: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِّيُرَوْا۟ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ
ayas.translation: On that day men shall come forth in sundry bodies that they may be shown their works.
ayas.transliteration: yawma-idhiy yaṣdurun nāsu ashtātal liyuraw a`mālahum

ayas.arabic: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُۥ
ayas.translation: So. he who has done an atom's weight of good shall see it
ayas.transliteration: faman ya`mal mithqāla dharratin khayran yarah

ayas.arabic: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُۥ
ayas.translation: And he who has done an atom's weight of evil shall see it.
ayas.transliteration: wa man ya`mal mithqāla dharratin sharran yarah
